message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but this needs to be fair to both of us. This is a slightly better split for me.
I see you want a better split, I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.  The value of the money is decreasing, and further negotiation will only hurt both of us.
